Summary: I was filming and caught this object in my footage not knowing what or how it got in my footage.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a monday morning January 29th 2011, i was working. i do music so i was trying to get some footage of downtown. I got a couple of scenes but later when i went back to look at the film i was trying to see what was this glare or whatever it was come from. i didnt see it with my naked eye at the time. the object seemed to be following us and hid behind first tennessee building in one of my clips. its not a fake i tell you.
trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around January 29th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cylinder, Square, Rectagular
